messages.message: Can a user only build 1 app? I built an invoice app and navigated back to main page. When I click build solution, it takes me directly to the one I was already working on. There’s no obvious way to build a new one… It would make more sense to me if the landing page after clicking ‘start building’ included a list of apps that I had built + an option to build a net new app
this + button should bring you to a new project, but agree it’s not super intuitive
cc @Jessica @Eric Han i know we just changed this behavior but should we change it back?
ah I see the sidebar pops out
we previously had a separate button (in its own row) for "Create new project" --- is the suggestion that that was a better option to start with?
It seems like Will was confused about being navigated back to the most recent project. Before we would navigate to this page
I wonder if it makes more sense to add a plus icon below the others in the sidebar
folder icon isn’t super intuitive here either imo
I am interpreting this feedback as it is better to land the user on a create new project screen vs most recent project
@Arjun can we sync when you have a minute
As a new user building an app for the first time, I just wanted to start over from scratch rather than go back and edit the existing app
and it just wasn’t obvious how to do that
I think it's also to make create new more discoverable
Cuz you have to know the sidebar expands and it's hiding under that
Agreed - going to sync with Arjun about this
@tj.serkes has updated designs for this and will work with @Arjun
hey team, let's collect all the feedback first before changing the design.
